Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Protects valuable community services affected by the sale, mortgage and lease of real property of religious corporations
Summary: Protects valuable community services affected by the sale, mortgage and lease of real property of religious corporations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to protecting community services affected by the sale, mortgage and lease of real property of religious corporations
